oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, 23 lines per page, in black and red.
According to the colophon (f. 69v), copy completed on 21 Jumādá al-Ūlá in the hand of Bāqir Ḥusayn.
بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم البداية أمر من لديه وكل شيء يعود إليه له الحمد على ما انعم علينا سوابق المنعم... :Incipit
Ownership statement on fly leaf [3] : "Īn kitāb mulk-i Mīr Ikrām ʻAlī ṭālib al-ʻilm".
MS Arab SM4207. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
